/Appointment.summary: Manager for resources of type Appointment
/Appointment.description: The Manager for resources of type Appointment: provides services to manage the collection of all the Appointment instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Appointment based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _language
parameters.description: The language of the resource

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Appointment date/time.

parameters.name: specialty
parameters.description: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment

parameters.name: service-category
parameters.description: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: When the resource version last changed

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: The slots that this appointment is filling

parameters.name: reason-code
parameters.description: Coded reason this appointment is scheduled

parameters.name: based-on
parameters.description: The service request this appointment is allocated to assess

parameters.name: appointmentGroupId
parameters.description: Search parameter for finding resources based on group id

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: One of the individuals of the appointment is this patient

parameters.name: responsible
parameters.description: Search parameter for finding responsible entity on Appointment

parameters.name: supporting-info
parameters.description: Additional information to support the appointment

parameters.name: careteamParticipant
parameters.description: Search parameter for finding appointments based on careteam participants

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: An Identifier of the Appointment

parameters.name: practitioner
parameters.description: One of the individuals of the appointment is this practitioner

parameters.name: appointment-type
parameters.description: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)

parameters.name: part-status
parameters.description: The Participation status of the subject, or other participant on the appointment. Can be used to locate participants that have not responded to meeting requests.

parameters.name: service-type
parameters.description: The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment

parameters.name: _security
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given security labels

parameters.name: _filter
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a filter

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Any one of the individuals participating in the appointment

parameters.name: _profile
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given profile

parameters.name: intended-audience
parameters.description: Search parameter for finding intended audience on Appointment

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Return resources linked to by the given target

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Tags applied to this resource

parameters.name: reason-reference
parameters.description: Reason the appointment is to take place (resource)

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: This location is listed in the participants of the appointment

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: Logical id of this artifact

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search on the entire content of the resource

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The overall status of the appointment

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

/Patient.summary: manage the collection of resources of type Patient
/Patient.description: Access to services to manage the collection of all resources of type Patient

get.summary: Search all resources of type Patient based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _language
parameters.description: The language of the resource

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): The patient's date of birth
* [Person](person.html): The person's date of birth
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): The Related Person's date of birth

parameters.name: deceased
parameters.description: This patient has been marked as deceased, or as a death date entered

parameters.name: address-state
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A state specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A state specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A state specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A state specified in an address

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): Gender of the patient
* [Person](person.html): The gender of the person
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): Gender of the practitioner
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): Gender of the related person

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: All patients linked to the given patient

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code (irrespective of use value)

parameters.name: address-country
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A country specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A country specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A country specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A country specified in an address

parameters.name: death-date
parameters.description: The date of death has been provided and satisfies this search value

parameters.name: phonetic
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm
* [Person](person.html): A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A portion of either family or given name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A portion of name using some kind of phonetic matching algorithm

parameters.name: telecom
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): The value in any kind of telecom details of the patient
* [Person](person.html): The value in any kind of contact
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): The value in any kind of contact
* [PractitionerRole](practitionerrole.html): The value in any kind of contact
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): The value in any kind of contact

parameters.name: address-city
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A city specified in an address
* [Person](person.html): A city specified in an address
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A city specified in an address
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A city specified in an address

parameters.name: email
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A value in an email contact
* [Person](person.html): A value in an email contact
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A value in an email contact
* [PractitionerRole](practitionerrole.html): A value in an email contact
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A value in an email contact

parameters.name: given
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A portion of the given name of the patient
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A portion of the given name

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: A patient identifier

parameters.name: address
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text
* [Person](person.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text

* [PractitionerRole](practitionerrole.html): A value in a phone contact
* [RelatedPerson](relatedperson.html): A value in a phone contact

parameters.name: organization
